name: Beacons
description: Beacons is an AI-powered platform that helps creators build customizable link-in-bio websites to monetize their audience and grow their brand.
longDescription: Beacons.ai is a mobile-first website builder and marketing suite designed for content creators, influencers, and entrepreneurs to streamline their online presence and monetization. It provides a customizable link-in-bio page that aggregates social media links, products, and services into one accessible hub, primarily for platforms like Instagram and TikTok. The platform leverages AI to auto-generate content, optimize engagement, and create media kits for brand partnerships. Founded in 2019, Beacons aims to simplify the creator economy by offering tools for e-commerce, email marketing, and analytics without requiring technical expertise. It supports creators at all stages, from beginners to established influencers, by providing a seamless way to connect with audiences and generate revenue. The service is noted for its ease of use and extensive free features, though premium plans unlock advanced tools for scaling creator businesses.
features: Customizable link-in-bio pages allow creators to showcase their brand and connect all social media platforms in one place, driving traffic efficiently.
Built-in e-commerce tools enable creators to sell digital products, memberships, and services directly from their Beacons page, simplifying monetization.
AI-powered content generation creates captions, emails, and taglines based on trends, saving creators time and boosting engagement.
Real-time analytics provide insights into traffic, clicks, and conversions, helping creators optimize their content strategy.
Email marketing tools allow creators to build subscriber lists and send automated campaigns to engage followers and drive sales.
Media kit creation automates professional pitches with engagement data, helping creators secure brand sponsorships.
Affiliate link integration enables creators to earn commissions by promoting products directly on their Beacons page.
Mobile-friendly website builder lets creators design professional pages in minutes without coding skills.

faqs.question: What is Beacons.ai used for?
faqs.answer: Beacons.ai is a link-in-bio platform that helps creators build customizable websites to monetize their audience through e-commerce, affiliate links, and brand partnerships.

faqs.question: Is Beacons.ai free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Beacons offers a free plan with core features like link-in-bio pages and basic analytics, but charges a 9% transaction fee on sales, with premium plans available for advanced tools.

faqs.question: Can I sell products on Beacons.ai?
faqs.answer: Yes, creators can sell digital products, courses, memberships, and appointments directly through their Beacons page, integrated with platforms like Shopify and Etsy.

faqs.question: How does the AI feature work on Beacons.ai?
faqs.answer: Beacons uses AI to auto-generate content like captions, emails, and media kits based on your social media data, optimizing engagement and saving time.

faqs.question: Can I customize my Beacons page?
faqs.answer: Yes, Beacons offers extensive customization options, including colors, fonts, layouts, and branding, to create a unique link-in-bio page that matches your style.

faqs.question: Does Beacons support brand partnerships?
faqs.answer: Beacons provides AI-powered media kits and outreach tools to help creators pitch to brands and secure sponsorships based on their audience metrics.

faqs.question: Is Beacons.ai mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, Beacons is designed for mobile use, allowing creators to build and manage their pages from their phones, ideal for the mobile-first creator economy.

faqs.question: What are the downsides of using Beacons.ai?
faqs.answer: The free plan includes a 9% transaction fee on sales, and some users report occasional app issues, such as slow email sending or setup difficulties.
